…in April 2009, when actor Ashton Kutcher emerged as the victor in a race with CNN to become the first Twitter user to collect more than a million followers. Although celebrity “e-watching” remained a significant draw to the service, businesses soon began sending tweets about promotions and events. Political campaigns…
